🔜 Aquafarm

Profit squeezing tentacles for octomized lending yields on Ethereum — 01 October 2020.

Why limit your yield farming to the land when the earth's surface is 70% water? Wrap your tentacles around a sea of gains. Project Overview

👷 Tentacles

Pricing oracle aggregator for octomated interchain lending — 01 November 2020.

When the universe is infinitely expanding, why would you limit your yield farming to the earth? There's a whole galaxy of gains to wrap your space tentacles around. Project Overview

✅ Octoken

Bonding curve distribution and DEX allocation of the OCTO governance token — COMPLETE.

A bonding curve smart contract will autonomously create a market for the OCTO initial offering without the need for an exchange. Anyone can participate in the allocation and a DEX liquidity provision will be made soon after. Project Overview

DYOR: Do Your Own Octopus Research 🐙

Our community run a Telegram Group, we use Snaphot for governance, and we are verified on Etherscan.

Total $OCTO supply is 800k, with 200k allocated to interest program, and 275k to project reserve.

200k sold to early backers (0.18 USDC), and 125k to public via bonding curve distribution (to 1.08 USDC).
